TopicTitle: weird EVA mouth glitch with texture replacer

Articles.Content:
so. I use texture replacer because I like having a new skybox. anyways not the point. I narrowed my problem down to texture replacer after doing a bit of research with other people who had this problem. I tried re-installing and such, and the only fix was to

re-move texture replacer, which I would not like to do as I like my skyboxes and such. the list of mods I use are

Chatter

CommunityResourcePack

CrewManifest

DMagicOrbitalScience

Kopernicus

New Horizions

RemoteTech

SCANSat

And texture replacer

 if you know any way to fix this, if you could message me that would be great.

Hi - I was able to fix this by changing the reflections settings on Texture Replacer from "Real" to "static".  I didn't test it, but I imagine turning thme off will also do the trick. Not as pretty, but it's better than the mouth glitch! 

If anyone has a better fix I'd love to hear it.
